subject: Please, who is this Mr Johns
body:
Please, who is this Mr Johnson Dan that sent us another address for your shipment? How does he relate to you? He said that is your brother.will WORD BANK is not aware of this development because he said he is going to take care of the $3.M that you have with us here and are ready to pay any bills? For the delivery Please we wait for your response before we respond to his email now
And your full information.
Thanks
Mr.Brian Moynihan
BANK OF AMERICA

subject: Re:   Please, who is this Mr Johns
body:
Hello Moynihan,

Thank you for reaching out. I'm not sure who this Mr. Johnson Dan is, as I don't recall giving anyone permission to handle my affairs. Could you please provide more details about the message he sent? 

Also, could you clarify what you mean by "WORD BANK"? I'm a bit confused about that part.

Looking forward to your response.

Best regards.

Best wishes,
Nobuko

subject: Re: Please, who is this Mr Johns
body:
Dear I'm so happy to hear from you we have a consignment bos here that
belong to you from world Bank Mr Johnson came to our office trying to clean
the consignment boss that belongs to you that's the major reason why we
contact you so what we need here from you is your full name and your phone
number address Mr James is ready to pay anything to make sure we hand him
your consignment box but we say no if you need your concerning box to
deliver to you immediately  we get the information we ask from you your
name address and phone number

subject: Re: Please, who is this Mr Johns
body:
Hello there,

I'm thrilled to hear about this situation, it's quite intriguing! I appreciate your efforts in reaching out to me. It's interesting that Mr. Johnson is so keen on getting the box, I wonder why that is? 

Also, could you please tell me more about this box from the World Bank? What exactly does it contain and why does it belong to me? 

Looking forward to hearing from you soon.

Best wishes,
Nobuko

subject: Please, who is this Mr Johns
body:
Dear this is FedEx delivery company I  our duty is to deliver package to
our customers according to the information we get from world Bank the box
contains 2 million dollars then we ask world bank why this money and the
world back said that is your inheritance fund and the what bank give us
serious instruction that no one show Tampa with your fund please if you
need your fund to be delivered to you our delivery fee is $ 1,700 try and
send it now Mr Johnson get information about your fund that is reason why
he's trying to claim your box and because of the instruction from the world
Bank will decide not to give your consignment box to him try and get back
to us with your full name address phone number and delivery fee thanks

subject: Re: Please, who is this Mr Johns
body:
Hello there,

Thank you for reaching out to me. I'm quite surprised to hear about this package containing a million dollars. It's not every day that one hears such news! 

Could you please provide more details about this? How did the World Bank come to decide on sending me this fund? And who is Mr. Johnson, and why is he trying to claim my box?

I appreciate your assistance in delivering the package, but I would like to understand more about the delivery fee. Could you explain how it is calculated?

Looking forward to hearing from you soon.

Best wishes,
Nobuko

subject: Please, who is this Mr Johns
body:
Dear friend how are you doing today and how is your family I'm so sorry
that You did not hear from me throughout last week is because I'm very busy
let's go to the business they box that will have here is from the world
Bank, world Bank map out 40.000,000  million US Dollars every year to help
people and it happen that your email involve the people that benefits for
the money last year that's the reason why you have this fund here with us
remember that the world Bank did not ask you to pay any fee or request for
any documents from you because they don't need all those things from you.

The fund  belongs to you and world bank give us instruction not to Temple
or take any fund  from your bos. If you provide us  your address and your
phone number to us why we need the information is because we don't want to
make any mistake when delivering the box to you we are requesting from you
is for your delivering fee you are not going to send other money if you pay
your delivery fee.

We hope to hear from you as soon as you receive this message thanks from
FedEx company.
